flavorText:
"Before the blessed assault begins, we must seek specimens that are well-adapted to our way of . . . life."
—Sheoldred, Whispering One

foreignData.flavorText: „Bevor unser gesegneter Angriff beginnt, müssen wir Lebewesen finden, die sich gut an unsere Lebensweise angepasst haben." —Sheoldred die Flüsternde
foreignData.name: Verdorbener Schnitter
foreignData.text: {B}, opfere eine Kreatur: Regeneriere den Verdorbenen Schnitter.

foreignData.flavorText: "Antes de que comience el asalto de los benditos, debemos buscar especímenes que estén bien adaptados a nuestra forma de... vida." —Sheoldred, la Susurradora
foreignData.name: Cosechador corrompido
foreignData.text: {B}, sacrificar una criatura: Regenera el Cosechador corrompido.

foreignData.flavorText: « Avant que l'assaut béni ne puisse commencer, nous devons trouver des spécimens qui sont déjà adaptés à notre mode de . . . vie. » —Sheoldred la Susurrante
foreignData.name: Moissonneur corrompu

foreignData.flavorText: "Prima di dare inizio all'assalto benedetto, dobbiamo cercare esemplari che siano ben adattati al nostro stile di. . . vita." —Sheoldred, La Bisbigliante

foreignData.flavorText: 「祝福された攻撃の始まる前に、よく適応した見本を見つけなければならない。我々流の……生命に。」 ――囁く者、シェオルドレッド

name: Corrupted Harvester
originalText: {B}, Sacrifice a creature: Regenerate Corrupted Harvester.

rulings.text: You may sacrifice Corrupted Harvester to pay for its own regeneration ability. If you do, however, it won’t regenerate. It’ll just end up in its owner’s graveyard as a result of the sacrifice.

text: {B}, Sacrifice a creature: Regenerate Corrupted Harvester.
